verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
C-D
That I may know Him, wonderful Lord
(repeat)
To know the power of His great
Resurrection
And join in fellowship with that
Of His sufferings
And in that being made conformable
To His death
That I may know Him, wonderful Lord

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
That I may know You, wonderful Lord
(repeat)
To know the power of Your great
Resurrection
And join in fellowship with that
Of Your sufferings
And in that being made conformable
To Your death
That I may know You, wonderful Lord

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
That we may know You, wonderful Lord
(repeat)
To know the power of Your great
Resurrection
And join in fellowship with that
Of Your sufferings
And in that being made conformable
To Your death
That we may know You, wonderful Lord
